attributes.action: Re Nationalize the Bank of England
attributes.additional_details:
The Bank of England (BOE) was formed in 1694 as a ''Private Joint Stock Association' and granted the monopoly over the UK's money.

BOE was Nationalized by Clement Attlee in 1946 and covertly effectively re-privatized in 1977 through Bank of England Nominees Limited formed for the purpose.

The time has come to 'Re-Nationalize' The Bank of England.
